backupCreated.title: Backup Created
backupCreated.text: A new backup was created and compressed: {path}

updateAvailable.title: Update Available
updateAvailable.text: A new update is available! Installed: {installed}, Latest: {latest}

serverStarted.title: Server Started
serverStarted.text: The SCUM server has started. Reason: {reason}

serverStopped.title: Server Stopped
serverStopped.text: The SCUM server has stopped. Reason: {reason}

serverCrashed.title: Server Crashed
serverCrashed.text: The server crashed and was restarted. Reason: {reason}

managerStarted.title: Manager Started
managerStarted.text: SCUM Server Manager script has started successfully.

firstInstall.title: First Install
firstInstall.text: Server files or manifest not found, performing first install/update.

firstInstallComplete.title: First Install Complete
firstInstallComplete.text: Server files installed and service started.

installError.title: Install Error
installError.text: The server service failed to start after first install!

restartError.title: Restart Error
restartError.text: Server service failed to start after scheduled restart!

startError.title: Start Error
startError.text: The SCUM server service failed to start after backup and update check!

autoRestartError.title: Auto-Restart Error
autoRestartError.text: The SCUM server service failed to auto-restart after a crash!

backupWarning.title: Backup Warning
backupWarning.text: The Saved folder was not found, backup was skipped.

adminStopResult.title: Admin Stop Result
adminStopResult.text: Admin stop command executed. Server status: {status}

updateInProgress.title: Update In Progress
updateInProgress.text: Server update is being installed. Reason: {reason}

updateAvailable.title: Update Available
updateAvailable.text: A new server update is available! Server will be updated and restarted in {delayMinutes} minutes.

updateWarning5.title: Update Warning
updateWarning5.text: Server update will start in {warningMinutes} minutes! Server will restart for the update.

updateStarting.title: Update Starting
updateStarting.text: Server is restarting now to install the update...

updateCompleted.title: Update Completed
updateCompleted.text: Server update completed successfully! Server is back online.

adminRestartWarning5.title: Admin Restart
adminRestartWarning5.text: Admin restart will start in {warningMinutes} minutes!

adminRestartNow.title: Admin Restart
adminRestartNow.text: Server is restarting now by admin command!

adminStopWarning.title: Admin Stop
adminStopWarning.text: Server will be stopped in {delayMinutes} minutes by admin!

adminStopWarning5.title: Admin Stop
adminStopWarning5.text: Server will be stopped in {warningMinutes} minutes by admin!

adminStopNow.title: Admin Stop
adminStopNow.text: Server is being stopped now by admin command!

adminStartNow.title: Admin Start
adminStartNow.text: Server is being started now by admin command!

adminUpdateWarning5.title: Admin Update
adminUpdateWarning5.text: Admin update will start in {warningMinutes} minutes!

adminUpdateNow.title: Admin Update
adminUpdateNow.text: Server is restarting now for admin-initiated update!

updateInProgress.title: Update In Progress
updateInProgress.text: Server update is being installed. Reason: {reason}

serverCrashed.title: Server Crashed
serverCrashed.text: The server crashed and was restarted. Reason: {reason}
